segments.text: I see the adult woman standing there, completely absorbed in polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so focused, like nothing else in the world matters to her right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I notice the water spilling over the sink, forming a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not see the chaos happening right at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing quickly, threatening to slip beneath her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a ticking time bomb, ready to explode with a single misstep.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are planning something behind her backâ€”unbeknownst to her, of course.
segments.speaker: PAR
